title: Test notification configuration for discussion
body: This issue is testing some automation for me and FedRAMP staff. If you see this and you do not work in the PMO, please disregard. Oh, and have a nice weekend!
author: aj-stein-gsa

comments.body: Oh well, that didn't work as well as I had hoped, I am closing it for now. For those quietly lurking, thanks for your patronage. 😄
comments.author: aj-stein-gsa
